ComicInfo.Title: 2: The Dirt Nap
ComicInfo.Summary: SEX • DEATH • LIVE TV! NEW YORK CITY, 1951: Mike buries his father and Ginsburg buries the lede making his sales pitch. Will TV be an East Coast or West Coast medium? And in a pile of filthy photographs Mike finds one image that is really and truly shocking.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 22:29:58. [CVDB420617] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 18:10:58. [Issue ID 1133362]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dick Danning,Michael White,Gene Ford,Clint Haygood,Mariangela Melato,Kara Kelly,Joseph Ginsberg,Libby Meyers,Guy Roth,Hamilton Stanhope
